name: PAULBLAST!
description:
(This game was made in 2 months for the ANTONJAM 3! You can find more info about it here : https://itch.io/jam/antonjam3-the-blast-jam)

What? Anton's lost his alcohol bottle? And apparently no one is free to go help him get it except for Paul? Well, this sounds like a job for none other than... PAUL!!!!!! AHHHH!!!!!! Clear objectives in the blue areas by using bombs to destroy crates, killing enemies, and delivering items to various people! Retrieve the fabled alcohol bottle that Anton was too lazy to get himself for some reason! Happy blasting!

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

X - Throw

ESC - Pause

R - Restart Level
